Package com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.filter.account

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AuthenticationJwtFactory  
    JwtAccountResolver
    A JWT Account Resolver can inspect a String token (a JWT), assert the JWT's validity by verifying a cryptographic signature, and if valid, return the Account instance reflected by the token.
    JwtSigningKeyResolver
    A JWT Signing Key Resolver can inspect a request and return an appropriate cryptographic signing key used to create or verify JWT signatures.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountAuthorizationFilter  
    AccountResolverFilter  
    AuthenticationResultSaver  
    AuthorizationHeaderAccountResolver  
    CookieAccountResolver
    This account resolver, resolves the account based on the access token cookie, using internally the jwtAccountResolver If the access token cookie is somehow not properly validated, then this Resolver will try to create a new one if the refresh token is available as a cookie as well.
    CookieAuthenticationResultSaver  
    DefaultJwtAccountResolver
    Sine 1.0.0 we are restricting this resolver to only function for Access Tokens but not for Refresh Tokens.
    DefaultJwtSigningKeyResolver  
    HttpImmutableAccount  
    ImmutableAccount
    Internal implementation class, not to be used by SDK users.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InsecureCookieException
